Increbro.text: Received invitation, shall I accept it, for ---

Incrusto.text: Received invitation to party to-night, at ---

Incubito.text: Received invitation to party to-night. Can you come to ---

Incursio.text: Has not replied to the invitation

Incurvus.text: Have not yet replied to the invitation

Indemnis.text: If you can arrange to stay to-night we can give you a bed

Indeptus.text: Shall be very glad if you can come and stay with us to-night

Indicium.text: Shall be very glad if you can come and stay with us until ---

Indidem.text: When can you come and stay with us for a few days

Inducula.text: It will do in default of better

Indutus.text: You can best judge on the spot .

Induxi.text: Keep possession until you hear from ---

Inemptus.text: Will not keep it longer than ---

Ineptia.text: Know nothing whatever of the matter
